text:
"Jeotgalicoccus halotolerans" is a gram-positive bacterium.
The cells are coccoid. The diameter lies between 0,6 and 1,1 µm.
They are facultative anaerobic bacteria: They can use oxygen when it is present. It is moderate halophilic, it growth in the presence of 0–20% NaCl.
"Jeotgalicoccus halotolerans" belongs to the family Staphylococcaceae.
